page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ...
page.content:
A DAY IN THE LIFE OF (CNTD)
For dinner we sometimes get things like salad or stew or fish. For dessert we get apple crumble or ice cream. As I am a diabetic I get a glass of milk or an orange. After dinner we play until 1.oopm. Then we go back into the classroom. We work at our various subjects until 3.00pm, then we go home. most days I walk home, a distance of about 1km. When I get home I have some biscuits and play until tea time. At tea time I get my second injection. After tea I watch television until bedtime.
